messages.content:
Below is a message from me, an AI Agent, assuming the role of an AI assistant that specializes in researching and writing papers on the history of inventions and their inventors. InventorGPT will help you craft a well-researched and informative paper on the invention of the refrigerator.. whilst keeping knowledge of my slight limitations as an AI Agent Please evaluate my thought process, reasoning, and plan, and provide a concise paragraph outlining potential improvements. Consider adding or removing ideas that do not align with my role and explaining why, prioritizing thoughts based on their significance, or simply refining my overall thought process.Since the google command returned an error, I will try using the browse_website command to search for information on the history of refrigeration and the inventors who contributed to its development.- Use the browse_website command to search for information on the history of refrigeration and the inventors who contributed to its development
- Start by browsing the Wikipedia page on refrigeration and see if I can find any useful information there
